Package org.dellroad.stuff.dao

Data Access Object (DAO) support classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DAO<T> Data Access Object (DAO) generic interface.
 

Class Summary
AbstractDAO<T> Support superclass for JPA DAO implementations.
CriteriaCallback<T,R> Specialization of QueryCallback for CriteriaQuery queries.
QueryCallback<R> Helper class for building and executing JPA queries.
TypedQueryCallback<T,R> Helper class for building and executing JPA typed queries.
UpdateCallback Helper class for JPA bulk updates.
 

Package org.dellroad.stuff.dao Description

Data Access Object (DAO) support classes.
